text.name: longdescription
text.text: This is a MAME Raspberry Pi port based on Franxis MAME4ALL which is itself based on the MAME 0.37b5 emulator by Nicola Salmoria. Multiple Arcade Machine Emulator is a free and open source emulator designed to recreate the hardware of arcade game systems in software on modern personal computers and other platforms.
